imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Circular red logo with white 'EX' letters for header display (logo-header.dim_64x64.png)
- Circular red logo with white 'EX' letters for favicon 32x32 (favicon-32x32.dim_32x32.png)
- Circular red logo with white 'EX' letters for favicon 16x16 (favicon-16x16.dim_16x16.png)
- Circular red logo with white 'EX' letters for Apple touch icon (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)

existing_features.title: Adjust the logo size in the Header component to be appropriately scaled and ensure circular styling is preserved with proper CSS (rounded-full or equivalent)

new_feature_requests.summary: Adjust logo size and make it circular with proper styling
Replace the current logo image with the uploaded circular logo (cropped_circle_image.png) in all sizes

projectName: Resize logo and apply circular styling
